projects.title: Crypto
projects.description: A full-stack cryptocurrency dashboard that allows users to track real-time coin prices, analyze market trends, and manage a personalized watchlist. Built with secure authentication, responsive design, and API integrations for live data.

projects.title: shopApp
projects.description: A modern e-commerce web app where users can browse products, add items to a cart, and complete purchases securely. Features include authentication, product filtering, and an intuitive frontend powered by a connected backend API.

projects.title: NoteNest
projects.description: A note-taking app with categories and local storage support.

projects.title: FitTrack
projects.description: A fitness tracker that logs workouts and progress visually.

projects.title: CodeCritic
projects.description: A code snippet review tool with comments and upvotes.

projects.title: InspoQuote
projects.description: A daily inspiration quote generator with save/share options.

projects.title: Blogify
projects.description: A minimalist blogging platform with Markdown and comments.
